body.name: SAMSUNG 24 Inch QHD Computer Monitor, 75Hz, HDMI Monitor, Vertical, 1440p IPS Monitor, HDR10 (1 Billion Colors), TUV-Certified Intelligent Eye Care, S60A (LS24A600NWNXGO)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 34 mins
features: QHD RESOLUTION: 1.7x more pixel density than FHD monitors and the IPS monitor preserves color vividness and clarity of multimedia contents across a wide display with tones and shades that look accurate from virtually any angle with no color washing..Response time:5.0 milliseconds
Aspect Ratio is 16:9; Viewing Angle is 178° vertical / 178° horizontal; Brightness (Typ.) is 300cd/㎡ and Brightness (Min) is 250cd/㎡

WORK ENVIRONMENT: The 3-sided borderless slim monitor stretches from edge to edge for maximum visibility but maintains a sleek and modern look that creates more desk space. Connection of multiple monitors is a seamless experience with this HDMI monitor with multiple USB ports.

SLIM DESIGN: Adjust the height, tilt and swivel to a position that suits your eye level with this 24 inch vertical monitor and ergonomic design. The slim metal base adds to the clean sophistication, while VESA compatibility makes installation on a wall or mounting arm easy.

TUV CERTIFIED INTELLIGENT EYE CARE: Eye Saver Mode lowers blue light levels, for reduced eye strain during long work hours making this 4K monitor easy on eyes. Flicker-free technology adds further viewing comfort by eliminating flickering at all levels of brightness.
body.description: Delivering stunning, life-like image quality with high pixel density and fine detail. With 1.7X the pixel density of FHD resolution, you can view more lines of code, more detailed design images, more content on the screen with smaller fonts that are legible, and be more productive. Optimized for enhanced work environments. Samsung’s 24 inch S60UA QHD monitors feature an IPS panel delivering crystal clear color quality and a wide viewing angle of 178°. Every user can expect a great viewing experience from any angle, in vivid and vibrant color without washing or fade. Simply stunning, day or night. The surrounding lighting is detected by the brightness sensor to adjust brightness automatically. Even in bright daylight, watch dark, gritty dramas without squinting and straining your eyes to see the picture. Adjust the height, tilt and swivel to a position that suits your eye level with this 24 inch vertical monitor and ergonomic design. The slim metal base adds to the clean sophistication, while VESA compatibility makes installation on a wall or mounting arm easy. Ideal game settings give you the edge on competition with a 75hz refresh rate and AMD FreeSync that creates smoother actions than the conventional 60hz display.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I've used iMacs for years and this year Apple stopped making the 27-inch iMac - of course, right when I had to replace mine. I bought the Mac Studio which needs a monitor vs the all-in-one of the iMac. I couldn't afford the Apple monitor so I researched what models/brands would be a good substitute. I don't think this is quite as good as the Apple monitor but it's close enough for me (there are some Samsung monitors that supposedly are as good or better than the Apple one). I've had trouble buying monitors for Mac computers in the past - they never were as crisp and clear as the iMac. This one is VERY crisp and clear. And works flawlessly with the computer. I do wish it had built in speakers but I can live with having external ones. The USB ports on the back are also super handy since the Mac Studio seems to think you only need two. I definitely recommend this monitor!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like this stand, it's easy to adjust. The screen is also very good, with two adjustable eye protection modes. The USB interface on the back is very practical.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great monitor but bad quality control
reviews.reviewText: Monitor works really well with my iMac as a secondary screen, the factory standards fantastic but I opted to use the VIVO arm. Monitor works really well with my iMac as a secondary screen, the factory stand is fantastic, but I opted to use the vevo arm. There is a white glitch at the left side of the screen may be from shipping. I’m not sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for the small home office
reviews.reviewText: With the pandemic, we had to set up a small office in our living room. We don't have a big desk, so any larger monitor would be too big. This one has the perfect size to work up close, and having the notebook monitor as auxiliary for when you are in a call.The USB-C hub helped a lot reduce the cables -- it charges the notebook and provides the connection for the dongle of a wireless keyboard/mouse combo. I wish the hub was a bit more powerful, as it takes a long time to charge the computer when everything is on. That's fine if you keep it connected the whole time, but if you are disconnecting and using your laptop often, you may find yourself out of charge.The resolution is great, and it's not easy to find a large resolution for this size of monitor at this price point. It's really cool to fit multiple windows in the screen and still have a large enough font to read the contents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Great monitor with one pretty large flaw.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great monitor and works very well with my M1 MacBook Pro. The stand it is on is very heavy and sturdy and allows a great range angles in all directions. The problem I have with this monitor is its use as a USB-C Dock, in that respect it is pretty terrible, at least with a M1 MacBook Pro. If the MacBook is on and awake when you plug it into the monitor via USB-C the monitor will wake up and everything works great, including the USB-C Dock with all its ports. Very nice. But, if you plug in your M1 MacBook Pro via USB-C while the laptop is either off, or asleep, the monitor wakes up for about a min, and then goes back to sleep. If the MacBook is connected and working (awake) but then you walk away and it is configured to go to sleep, the monitor when it sees the laptop go to sleep also goes to sleep. The problem is that when the monitor goes to sleep it puts the USB-C port to sleep as well, and it stops charging the laptop. The only way to keep charging the laptop is to not ever let the laptop go to sleep or shut down. As soon as the laptop either shuts down or goes to sleep, the monitor turns off the USB-C port and stops charging the laptop. So if you are off using the laptop on battery, get back home, and plug it into the USB-C port, it won't charge overnight unless you turn the laptop on manually and set it to never sleep. I opened a ticket with Samsung because I consider this to be "broken", but they insist that it is designed to work that way and hence nothing is wrong. As a monitor, they are correct. As a USB-C hub, that is fundamentally broken. Hence as a monitor this thing should get all 5 stars, but as a USB-C hub, it should get 1 as it is basically worthless as a USB-C hub. I suspect that Samsung could fix this problem with a software patch to the monitor, but of course they won't fix it because they insist it is not broken, making my customer experience with Samsung pretty bad too. All in all, if you do not care about the USB-C hub this is a great monitor, but if you care about the USB-C hub aspect, look elsewhere. Samsung, if you see this post, please consider fixing this bug in the software of your monitor. If you do, I will gladly update this review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Use for graphic design
reviews.reviewText: I'm in school and bought this screen for using Photoshop on my PC. Best screen for graphic design by far. Crystal clear and colors are vibrant. Size is great. Very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Monitor -- Not so great Amazon
reviews.reviewText: I just got another one of these for a total of two out of three monitors.Great video quality, and sufficiently large display.(I have them set for 1920x1080 even though they support up to 2560x1440) since I'm getting up there in years.The only problem was when it arrived from Amazon, it was clearly already opened and then re-taped, there was no plastic peel strips on anything, and it wasn't wrapped in plastic like it normally is (when it's actually new from Samsung).Very annoying since this was supposed to be a NEW monitor, NOT an opened box variant.Impressed with the monitor, not so impressed with Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars May be okay for the price, but Samsung could do better
reviews.reviewText: For the price, you are getting a usb hub that can power your laptop too. And it can do DP out for additional display. In paper, all of those were looking good. But when I set it up, the DP out was not consistent. It may be to do with the laptop I was using. Anyways, the biggest problem is the sharpness and picture quality. I have an HP 24 HD monitor, even that was much better than this Samsung. And then, I have a Dell Ultrasharp with same resolution, and there was not even a question on which one was better. I couldn't really believe Samsung made such a low quality product. So I ended up returning it and bought a used Dell Ultrasharp for similar price. More than happy about it.
Excellent quality. Purchased 2 to use as dual screens. Had issue daisy chaining them together, so they are hooked up separately through HDMI.4K looks great. Screen settings are confusing though.
Crystal clear, warm light to protect the eye.

Not many monitors come 24" and 1440p so it was interesting to see the great picture clarity. The usb c port is the primary reason I got this monitor because it allows me to use my laptop, tablet, or phone even. It can charge my laptop while it's consuming a lot of power and outputting display.It also came with a usb c, HDMI, and displayport cable so you are set no matter what device you are using.Great monitor, I got it brand new for $60 somehow but not sure if I would pay over like $270 for a monitor like this. At that point I would rather get a 1440p high refresh rate on sale
It works well. USB connectors (with USB 3.0 in LS27A600NWNXGO) and adjustable height are very handy features.
